conditions.short_description: Unstable wind slabs in the mountains in many parts of the country.
conditions.full_description: Unstable wind slabs in the mountains in many parts of the country.

area_forecast.forecast: Uppdated forecast 28.okt 10:00. Increasing snow on Tuesday and the night before Wednesday. Considerable uncertainty in the weather forecasts.
area_forecast.snow_condition: It will snow on Tuesday with increased intensity in the evening and the night before Wednesday. Weather forecasts do not agree on where the most snowfall will be, but it will be intense in places. The most intense snowfall could move over the SW corner and increase avalanche danger considerably.
area_forecast.weather: NA- eða SA-átt, 8-15 m/s, og snjókoma á köflum. Líkur á talsverðri snjókomu um tíma aðfaranótt miðvikudags. Mikil óvissa um hvar mesta úrkomuákefðin lendir. Hiti um og undir frostmarki.

area_forecast.forecast: There is little snow in the mountains. Snowfall expected on Tuesday night and Wednesday in NE wind. There is much uncertainties in the weather forecast with timing and amount of precipitation.
area_forecast.snow_condition: There is little snow in the mountains. Snowfall expected on Tuesday and Wednesday in NE wind. There is much uncertainties in the weather forecast with timing and amount of precipitation. Possible windslabs form in NE wind on Tuesday and Wednesday.
area_forecast.weather: NA- átt og byrjar að snjóa þriðjudagskvöldið og á miðvikudag en él og styttir svo upp á fimmtudag.

area_forecast.forecast: Considerable new snow accumulated in mountains last week, and wind slabs have formed in W- and S- aspects. Snow fall in NE wind on Wednesday could cause layering in the snow.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Considerable new snow in mountains in NNE- and NE wind last week, with some new snow added during the weekend. Windslabs are in S-W aspects. More snow seems to have accumulated in valleys then by the coast in the beginning of last week. Snowfall on Wednesday in NE wind could potentially build windslabs and cause some layering.
area_forecast.weather: Hæg breytilega átt og þurrt að mestu á þirðjudag, en snýr í NA-átt og snjókomu á miðvikudag og stöku él á fimmtudag.

area_forecast.forecast: Isolated wind slabs have formed in the mountains, mainly in gullies and lows
area_forecast.snow_condition: Wind slabs have formed in the mountains after snowfall during NE-wind last week, mainly in gullies and lows. Rather thin powder snow is in most places after snowfall last weekend.
area_forecast.weather: Fremur hæg NV-læg átt en snýst í S-átt á miðvikudag með skammvinnri snjókomu aðfaranótt fimmtudags.

weather_forecast.forecast: Widely strong N-W winds on Thursday and snow or snowshowers. Mainly dry in the SW.
